name: Good Works Ventures
overview: Good Works Ventures is a Montana based fund that invests in companies with high impact solutions to challenging problems. While we love to invest in Montana companies, we will consider any company that is paradigm changing and has the potential for good financial return. We invest in early and mid stage companies that show promise in their technology, scalability and management. We will consider loans, equity or hybrid instruments. Take a look through our portfolio companies. If you feel like your company should be among them, please be sure to contact us below. If you are an investor who is interested in co-investing along side us or you would like us to take a look at your portfolio companies, we are happy to engage in conversation. We invite both entrepreneurs and investors to our monthly meetings of the Hellgate Venture Network.

funding_round.source_description: Submittable raises $750K to replace email (for real this time)
